modName: The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings - Menu music
descriptionHtml:
The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings music for Main Menu.



Current Version 1.1

If you like this mod then press ENDORSE ME

V 1.1 I replaced Gothic 4 theme (which i added by mistake instead of W2 theme) with The Witcher 2 main menu theme.Now everything should work.

COMMENT TERMS AND CONDITIONS

author: EvilPhoenix
